result.execSummary:
The defendant Anthony L Mitchell was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court
Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes: Pay all mandatory costs, fees and surcharges by 07-05-2016 or entry of a civil judgment shall be imposed.

With credit for 12 days.  TIME SERVED DISPOSITION.
Concurrent with: any other sentence.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Anthony L Mitchell

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Notice of bond forfeiture mailed to defendant; Original in file. ($500.00 signature bond) gj

Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant.  

AS TO COUNT 1:

Court sentences defendant to serve 12 days in the House of Correction concurrent to any other sentence with credit for 12 (twelve) days, a TIME SERVED DISPOSITION.

Court ordered defendant pay all mandatory costs, fees and surcharges by July 5, 2016 or entry of a civil judgment shall be imposed.

20 day appeal given,

Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief and Pretrial Incarceration Credit; received and filed.

Defendant Anthony L Mitchell in court with attorney Thomas K Hackbart.  Jennifer L. Pickett appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. 

AS TO COUNT 1:

Defendant changes plea to GUILTY. Defendant examined as to his plea, advised of his Constitutional rights and the maximum penalty. Court found that defendant freely, voluntarily and intelligently waived his rights. Plea questionnaire received and filed. Parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis to sustain defendant's plea. Court found defendant guilty as charged in the criminal complaint and ordered a Judgment of Conviction be entered on the record. Defendant further advised that if he is not a US citizen deportation is possible.

Defendant Anthony L Mitchell in court with attorney Thomas K. Hackbart.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC.   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 31.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for January 4, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Court ordered Defendant held in the Milwaukee County Jail until turned over to Justice Point.   Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.  Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.
Court ordered bench warrant withdrawn.  Recall issued.

Defendant Anthony L Mitchell in court with attorney Reyna Ivonne Morales.  Defendant Anthony L Mitchell in custody.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Reserve Judge, Branch 31.  Scheduling conference scheduled for December 14, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Signature bond ordered to be forfeited in the amount of 500.00.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Attorney Thomas K. Hackbart in court prior to case being called.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea and sentencing.   Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.  Court ordered any bail posted to be forfeited.

Defendant Anthony L Mitchell in court, attorney Thomas K. Hackbart via-telephone.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea and sentencing. Defense counsel Thomas Hackbart is ill for today's proceedings.   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 37.   Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 2, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
SAME TERMS.

Defendant Anthony L Mitchell in court with attorney Thomas K. Hackbart.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

CASE RECALLED IN THE PM.  Defendant appeared at 1:30 indicating he believed his court hearing was scheduled at 1:30 p.m.  Attorney Hackbart was notified and returned to Branch 37.  The defendant appeared before the was warrant printed/turned over to deputy sheriff.  The Court orders the warrant WITHDRAWN and BAIL REINSTATED.

Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

Matter calendared for Plea/sentencing hearing.  Attorney Thomas K. Hackbart in court prior to case being called on the record.    Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.  REMAND TO COMMISSIONER. BAIL ORDERED FORFEITED.

Defendant Anthony L Mitchell in court with attorney Thomas K. Hackbart.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defense newly appointed.  Agreed Upon Request For A New Court Date received and filed with court.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 27, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Jessica Bellows contacted the Court to inform she is unavailable for July 23, 2015 at 1:30 p.m. status of counsel. Off the record form will be completed upon client's appearance, Court ordered case adjourned for status of counsel in Branch 37 on August 12, 2015 at 8:30 a.m.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.

Defendant Anthony L Mitchell in court.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for status of counsel. Defendant needs additional time to seek counsel.   Court ordered case adjourned for status of counsel in Branch 37.   Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Status conference scheduled for July 23, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Anthony L Mitchell in court pro-se.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC.  Defendant is not public defender eligible.   Court ordered case adjourned for status of counsel in Branch 37.  Status conference scheduled for June 3, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Signature bond that was previously signed to remain. No use or possession of any controlled substances without a valid prescription  Pre-trial conference scheduled for 04-30-2015 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Anthony L Mitchell
Current: 4053 North 12th Street #1, Milwaukee, WI 53209   (Effective: 03-30-2015)
Prior: 4053 North 12th Street #1, Milwaukee, WI 53209

Defendant Anthony L Mitchell in court.  Jeremy R. Arn appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Reserve Judge, Branch 46. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.   Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel.   Defendant does not qualify for Public Defender representation.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance.  Case is adjourned for a Pretrial Conference in Branch 37.vb
Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court appearance in Out-Of-Custody Court, Room 221 Safety Building on 3/30/15 @ 1:30pm
